message.content:
∀ (G : ℝ → ℝ) (r : ℝ), (∀ m n : ℤ, G r = min (abs (r - Real.sqrt (↑m ^ 2 + 2 * ↑n ^ 2)))) →
  Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)

∀ {G : ℝ → ℝ}, (∀ r > 0, ∃ m n : ℤ, G r = |r - Real.sqrt (m ^ 2 + 2 * n ^ 2)|) →
  Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)
∀ {r : ℝ}, 0 < r → ∃ G : ℝ → ℝ, (∀ m n : ℤ, G r = min G r (abs (r - sqrt (m^2 + 2*n^2)))) ∧ Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)
∀ {r : ℝ}, (0 < r) → ∃ G : ℝ → ℝ, (∀ m n : ℤ, G r = min (abs (r - Real.sqrt (m^2 + 2 * n^2)))) ∧ Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)
∀ {r : ℝ}, 0 < r → ∃ G, (∀ m n : ℤ, G r = |r - Real.sqrt (m^2 + 2*n^2)|) → Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)
∀ (G : ℝ → ℝ) (r : ℝ), (G r = ⨅ (m n : ℤ), |r - Real.sqrt (↑m ^ 2 + 2 * ↑n ^ 2)|) → Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)

∀ {r : ℝ}, 0 < r → ∃ m n : ℤ, |r - Real.sqrt (↑m ^ 2 + 2 * ↑n ^ 2)| = (fun r => |r - Real.sqrt (↑(Int.floor r) ^ 2 + 2 * ↑(Int.floor (Real.sqrt (r / 2))) ^ 2)|) r

Filter.Tendsto (fun r => (fun r => |r - Real.sqrt (↑(Int.floor r) ^ 2 + 2 * ↑(Int.floor (Real.sqrt (r / 2))) ^ 2)|) r) Filter.atTop (nhds 0)
∀ {r : ℝ}, 0 < r → ∃ G : ℝ → ℝ, (∀ m n : ℤ, G r = |r - Real.sqrt (m^2 + 2 * n^2)|) → Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)
∀ {r : ℝ}, 0 < r → ∃ m n : ℤ, |r - Real.sqrt (m ^ 2 + 2 * n ^ 2)| = G r ∧ Filter.Tendsto (fun r => G r) Filter.atTop (nhds 0)
∀ {r : ℝ}, 0 < r → ∃ G : ℝ → ℝ, (∀ m n : ℤ, G r = abs (r - Real.sqrt (m^2 + 2*n^2))) ∧ Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)
